sentences.sContent: They're resentful that outsiders presume to meddle in their affairs.
sentences.sCn: 他们对外人擅自干预他们的事务怨恨不已。

sentences.sContent: I presume you're here on business.
sentences.sCn: 我想你是来这儿出差的吧。

sentences.sContent: "Had he been home all week?"—"I presume so."
sentences.sCn: “他整个星期都在家吗？”—“我想是。”

sentences.sContent: ...They presume that the earlier their children are exposed to arts...

remMethod.val: pre(预先) ＋ sum(结论) ＋ e → 预先下的结论 → 假定

trans.tranOther: If you say that someone presumes to do something, you mean that they do it even though they have no right to do it

trans.tranCn: 推测，假定，相信；冒昧，擅自；认定，推定
trans.tranOther: If you presume that something is the case, you think that it is the case, although you are not certain
